item.author: Forge Team
item.title: Spawn Events Refactor; Breaking Change
item.summary: Spawn Events are broken, so we fixed them! Minor breaking changes ahoy.
item.description: Spawn Events are broken, so we fixed them! Minor breaking changes ahoy. If you used SpecialSpawn or CheckSpawn, they were most likely not working anyway.
